section.title: Introduction
section.para: The Emergency Service Model module contains all the entities definitions that the application will use. All the data structures that will be used to exchange information between the different modules, all the information that we want to persist to keep the status of the application and all the definitions that can reused by all the other modules will be included here.
The following sections will introduce the most important entities described inside this module as well as some helpers which were included here to keep the project structure simple.

The model module contains all the definitions and vocabulary that will be used across all the layers of the application. This module contains all the data structures that need to be persisted and all the other modules include this project as a dependency.
